name: RubyCoins
tag_list: microtransactions, virtual-goods, billing-system, recurring-billing, subscriptions, monetization, virtual-economy, mobile-payment, ecommerce
overview:
RubyCoins provides a cross-platform monetization-as-a-service for the desktop and mobile gaming space. The RubyCoins billing solution supports subscriptions and micropayments, and is fine-tuned to offer developers higher conversion through in-game payment integration (in-Flash, Android, and downloadable games), broader reach across multiple platforms, and deeper insight into game economies with comprehensive analytics tools.

RubyCoins was founded in October 2009 and is based in Palo Alto, CA.
